devdoc.details: SLA is a service level agreement contract used for service downtime compensation

params._periodId: 1. the id of the given period

params._tokenAddress: 1. address of the token to claim compensation

returns.providerStake: position of the provider (owner) of the SLA contract
returns.usersStake: position of the user of the SLA contract

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.
